name: html-css
description: A template for HTML and CSS

scripts.start: powershell -ExecutionPolicy Bypass -Command "Start-Process 'cmd.exe' '/c npx serve -l 3000'; Start-Sleep -Seconds 4; Start-Process 'C:\Program Files\Google\Chrome\Application\chrome.exe' 'http://localhost:3000'"

author: Ives van Hoorne
